other two classifiers, with LinearSVC having a slight advantage with a median accuracy of around 82%.\n         </p>\n         <h1 class=\"ib ic dt ar aq id dv ie dx if ig ih ii ij ik il im\" id=\"c436\">\n          Model Evaluation\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hj hk dt ar hl b hm in ho io hq ip hs iq hu ir hw dl\" id=\"85c7\">\n          Continue with our best model (LinearSVC), we are going to look at the confusion matrix, and show the discrepancies between predicted and actual labels.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"gm gn go gp gq is it ca\"><span class=\"iu ic dt ar iv b ew iw ix r iy\" id=\"b63a\">model = LinearSVC()</span><span class=\"iu ic dt ar iv b ew ji jj jk jl jm ix r iy\" id=\"7f5f\">X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test, indices_train, indices_test = train_test_split(features, labels, df.index, test_size=0.33, random_state=0)<br/>model.fit(X_train, y_train)<br/>y_pred = model.predict(X_test)</span><span class=\"iu ic dt ar iv b ew ji jj jk jl jm ix r iy\" id=\"b1fd\">from sklearn.metrics import confusion_matrix</span><span class=\"iu ic dt ar iv b ew ji jj jk jl jm ix r iy\" id=\"34f5\">conf_mat = confusion_matrix(y_test, y_pred)<br/>fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10,10))<br/>sns.heatmap(conf_mat, annot=True, fmt='d',<br/>            xticklabels=category_id_df.Product.values, yticklabels=category_id_df.Product.values)<br/>plt.ylabel('Actual')<br/>plt.xlabel('Predicted')<br/>plt.show()</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"gm gn go gp gq gl dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"dc dd kq\">\n           <div class=\"gw r gx gy\">\n            <div class=\"kr r\">\n             <div class=\"gr gs s t u gt ai br gu gv\">\n              <img class=\"s t u gt ai ha hb hc\" height=\"487\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*mioLqk8LeLvVsHfH1ZHaXA.png?q=20\" width=\"636\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"gr gs s t u gt ai hd\" height=\"487\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"636px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*mioLqk8LeLvVsHfH1ZHaXA.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*mioLqk8LeLvVsHfH1ZHaXA.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1272/1*mioLqk8LeLvVsHfH1ZHaXA.png 636w\" width=\"636\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u gt ai\" height=\"487\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"636px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/1272/1*mioLqk8LeLvVsHfH1ZHaXA.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*mioLqk8LeLvVsHfH1ZHaXA.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*mioLqk8LeLvVsHfH1ZHaXA.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1272/1*mioLqk8LeLvVsHfH1ZHaXA.png 636w\" width=\"636\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ew he hf hg de dc dd hh hi aq cl\">\n           Figure 7\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <p class=\"hj hk dt ar hl b hm hn ho hp hq hr hs ht hu hv hw dl\" id=\"1597\">\n          The vast majority of the predictions end up on the diagonal (predicted label = actual label), where we want them to be. However, there are a number of misclassifications, and it might be interesting to see what those are caused by:\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"gm gn go gp gq is it ca\"><span class=\"iu ic dt ar iv b ew iw ix r iy\" id=\"eacb\">from IPython.display import display</span><span class=\"iu ic dt ar iv b ew ji jj jk jl jm ix r iy\" id=\"9491\">for predicted in category_id_df.category_id:<br/>  for actual in category_id_df.category_id:<br/>    if predicted != actual and conf_mat[actual, predicted] &gt;= 10:<br/>      print(\"'{}' predicted as '{}' : {} examples.\".format(id_to_category[actual], id_to_category[predicted], conf_mat[actual, predicted]))<br/>      display(df.loc[indices_test[(y_test == actual) &amp; (y_pred == predicted)]][['Product', 'Consumer_complaint_narrative']])<br/>      print('')</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"gm gn go gp gq gl dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"dc dd ks\">\n           <div class=\"gw r gx gy\">\n            <div class=\"kt r\">\n             <div class=\"gr gs s t u gt ai br gu gv\">\n              <img class=\"s t u gt ai ha hb hc\" height=\"350\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*R43ECkNO8tNPkPPDiZRUPw.png?q=20\" width=\"566\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"gr gs s t u gt ai hd\" height=\"350\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"566px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*R43ECkNO8tNPkPPDiZRUPw.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*R43ECkNO8tNPkPPDiZRUPw.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1132/1*R43ECkNO8tNPkPPDiZRUPw.png 566w\" width=\"566\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u gt ai\" height=\"350\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"566px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/1132/1*R43ECkNO8tNPkPPDiZRUPw.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*R43ECkNO8tNPkPPDiZRUPw.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*R43ECkNO8tNPkPPDiZRUPw.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1132/1*R43ECkNO8tNPkPPDiZRUPw.png 566w\" width=\"566\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ew he hf hg de dc dd hh hi aq cl\">\n           Figure 8\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <figure class=\"gm gn go gp gq gl dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"dc dd ku\">\n           <div class=\"gw r gx gy\">\n            <div class=\"kv r\">\n             <div class=\"gr gs s t u gt ai br gu gv\">\n              <img class=\"s t u gt ai ha hb hc\" height=\"343\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*kQTqpHWDKfl3fvfwHvPhVw.png?q=20\" width=\"555\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"gr gs s t u gt ai hd\" height=\"343\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"555px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*kQTqpHWDKfl3fvfwHvPhVw.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*kQTqpHWDKfl3fvfwHvPhVw.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1110/1*kQTqpHWDKfl3fvfwHvPhVw.png 555w\" width=\"555\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u gt ai\" height=\"343\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"555px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/1110/1*kQTqpHWDKfl3fvfwHvPhVw.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*kQTqpHWDKfl3fvfwHvPhVw.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*kQTqpHWDKfl3fvfwHvPhVw.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1110/1*kQTqpHWDKfl3fvfwHvPhVw.png 555w\" width=\"555\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ew he hf hg de dc dd hh hi aq cl\">\n           Figure 9\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <p class=\"hj hk dt ar hl b hm hn ho hp hq hr hs ht hu hv hw dl\" id=\"6e7d\">\n          As you can see, some of the misclassified complaints are complaints that touch on more than one subjects (for example, complaints involving both credit card and credit report). This sort of errors will always happen.\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"hj hk dt ar hl b hm hn ho hp hq hr hs ht hu hv hw dl\" id=\"6795\">\n          Again, we use the\n          <a class=\"cq fx hx hy hz ia\" href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pearson%27s_chi-squared_test\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           chi-squared test\n          </a>\n          to find the terms that are the most correlated with each of the categories:\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"gm gn go gp gq is it ca\"><span class=\"iu ic dt ar iv b ew iw ix r iy\" id=\"9125\">model.fit(features, labels)</span><span class=\"iu ic dt ar iv b ew ji jj jk jl jm ix r iy\" id=\"5d25\">N = 2<br/>for Product, category_id in sorted(category_to_id.items()):<br/>  indices = np.argsort(model.coef_[category_id])<br/>  feature_names = np.array(tfidf.get_feature_names())[indices]<br/>  unigrams = [v for v in reversed(feature_names) if len(v.split(' ')) == 1][:N]<br/>  bigrams = [v for v in reversed(feature_names) if len(v.split(' ')) == 2][:N]<br/>  print(\"# '{}':\".format(Product))<br/>  print(\"  . Top unigrams:\\n       . {}\".format('\\n       . '.join(unigrams)))<br/>  print(\"  . Top bigrams:\\n       . {}\".format('\\n       . '.join(bigrams)))</span></pre>\n         <p class=\"hj hk dt ar hl b hm hn ho hp hq hr hs ht hu hv hw dl\" id=\"d962\">\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Bank account or service\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top unigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . bank\n          <br/>\n          . account\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . debit card\n          <br/>\n          . overdraft fees\n          <br/>\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Consumer Loan\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top unigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . vehicle\n          <br/>\n          . car\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . personal loan\n          <br/>\n          . history xxxx\n          <br/>\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Credit card\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top unigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . card\n          <br/>\n          . discover\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . credit card\n          <br/>\n          . discover card\n          <br/>\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Credit reporting\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top unigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . equifax\n          <br/>\n          . transunion\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . xxxx account\n          <br/>\n          . trans union\n          <br/>\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Debt collection\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top unigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . debt\n          <br/>\n          . collection\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . account credit\n          <br/>\n          . time provided\n          <br/>\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Money transfers\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top unigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . paypal\n          <br/>\n          . transfer\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . money transfer\n          <br/>\n          . send money\n          <br/>\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Mortgage\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top unigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . mortgage\n          <br/>\n          . escrow\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . loan modification\n          <br/>\n          . mortgage company\n          <br/>\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Other financial service\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top unigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . passport\n          <br/>\n          . dental\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . stated pay\n          <br/>\n          . help pay\n          <br/>\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Payday loan\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top unigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . payday\n          <br/>\n          . loan\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . payday loan\n          <br/>\n          . pay day\n          <br/>\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Prepaid card\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top unigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . prepaid\n          <br/>\n          . serve\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . prepaid card\n          <br/>\n          . use card\n          <br/>\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Student loan\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top unigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . navient\n          <br/>\n          . loans\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . student loan\n          <br/>\n          . sallie mae\n          <br/>\n          # \u2018\n          <strong class=\"hl jh\">\n           Virtual currency\n          </strong>\n          \u2019:\n          <br/>\n          . Top bigrams:\n          <br/>\n          . money want\n          <br/>\n          . xxxx provider\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"hj hk dt ar hl b hm hn ho hp hq hr hs ht hu hv hw dl\" id=\"ed70\">\n          They are consistent within our expectation.\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"hj hk dt ar hl b hm hn ho hp hq hr hs ht hu hv hw dl\" id=\"77a8\">\n          Finally, we print out the classification report for each class:\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"gm gn go gp gq is it ca\"><span class=\"iu ic dt ar iv b ew iw ix r iy\" id=\"09c6\">from sklearn import metrics<br/>print(metrics.classification_report(y_test, y_pred, target_names=df['Product'].unique()))</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"gm gn go gp gq gl dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div 5.3 5.28a.5.5 0 0 1-.36.86.5.5 0 0 1-.36-.15l-5.29-5.29a1.34 1.34 0 0 0-1.88 0 1.34 1.34 0 0 0 0 1.89l2.23 2.23L9.3 21.4a.5.5 0 0 1-.36.85.5.5 0 0 1-.35-.14l-3.32-3.33a1.33 1.33 0 0 0-1.89 0 1.32 1.32 </svg>\n            </div>\n           </a>\n           <div class=\"ba g\">\n            <div class=\"bc\" id=\"lo-post-page-navbar-open-in-app-button\">\n             <div class=\"bd ba bb\">\n ah ai\">\n         <div>\n          <div class=\"dd de ap ce df b dg dh di dj dk dl dm dn do dp dq\" id=\"63af\">\n           <h1 class=\"df b dg dr di ds dk dt dm du do dv ap\">\n            Natural Language Processing is Fun!\n           </h1>\n          </div>\n         </div>\n         <div class=\"dw de ci ce cd dx dy dz ea eb ec ed ee ef eg eh ei\" id=\"5687\">\n          <h2 class=\"cd dx dy ej ea ek ec el ee em eg en ci\">\n           How computers understand Human Language\n          </h2>\n         </div>\n         <div class=\"eo\">\n          <div class=\"n ep eq er es\">\n               </path>\n                <path clip-rule=\"evenodd\" d=\"M10.76 20.9v-8.57H7.89v8.58h2.87zm-1.44-9.75c1 0 1.63-.65 1.63-1.48-.02-.84-.62-1.48-1.6-1.48-.99 0-1.63.64-1.63 1.48 0 .83.62 </div>\n         <p class=\"gi gj ap ce gk b dy gl ea gm gn go gp gq gr gs gt cx\" id=\"680e\">\n          <em class=\"gu\">\n           This article is part of an on-going series on NLP:\n          </em>\n          <a class=\"bx fw gv gw gx gy\" href=\"/@ageitgey/natural-language-processing-is-fun-9a0bff37854e\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <em class=\"gu\">\n            Part 1\n           </em>\n          </a>\n          <em class=\"gu\">\n           ,\n          </em>\n          <a class=\"bx fw gv gw gx gy\" href=\"/@ageitgey/text-classification-is-your-new-secret-weapon-7ca4fad15788\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <em class=\"gu\">\n            Part 2\n           </em>\n          </a>\n          <em class=\"gu\">\n           ,\n          </em>\n          <a class=\"bx fw gv gw gx gy\"  </em>\n          </a>\n          <em class=\"gu\">\n           ,\n          </em>\n          <a class=\"bx fw gv gw gx gy\" href=\"/@ageitgey/deepfaking-the-news-with-nlp-and-transformer-models-5e057ebd697d\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <em class=\"gu\">\n            Part 4\n           </em>\n          </a>\n          <em class=\"gu\">\n           . You can also read a reader-translated version of this article in\n          </em>\n          <a class=\"bx fw gv gw gx gy\" href=\"https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/8XDXgIm-Zcb3dL-2h9eSjA\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <em class=\"gu\">\n            \u666e\u901a\u8bdd\n           </em>\n          </a>\n          <em class=\"gu\">\n           .\n          </em>\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"gi gj ap ce gk b dy gl ea gm gn go gp gq gr gs gt cx\" id=\"07a8\">\n          <strong class=\"gk gz\">\n           <em class=\"gu\">\n            Giant update:\n           </em>\n          </strong>\n          <em class=\"gu\">\n          </em>\n          <a class=\"bx fw gv gw gx gy\" href=\"https://www.machinelearningisfun.com/get-the-book/\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <em class=\"gu\">\n            I\u2019ve written a new book based on these articles\n           </em>\n          </a>\n          <em class=\"gu\">\n           ! It not only expands and updates all my articles, but it has tons of brand new content and lots of hands-on coding projects.\n          </em>\n          <a class=\"bx fw gv gw gx gy\" href=\"https://www.machinelearningisfun.com/get-the-book/\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <em class=\"gu\">\n            Check it out now\n           </em>\n          </a>\n          <em class=\"gu\">\n           !\n          </em>\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"gi gj ap ce gk b dy gl ea gm gn go gp gq gr gs gt cx\" id=\"dd59\">\n          Computers are great at working with structured data like spreadsheets and database tables. But us humans usually communicate in words, not in tables. That\u2019s unfortunate for computers.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"hb hc hd he hf hg co cp paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"hh hi hj hk ai\">\n           <div class=\"co cp ha\">\n            <div class=\"hq r hj hr\">\n             <div class=\"hs r\">\n              <div class=\"hl hm s t u hn ai av ho hp\">\n               <img class=\"s t u hn ai ht hu hv\" height=\"814\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*r54-L9t14gqTbI6IlrW2wA.png?q=20\" width=\"2000\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"hl hm s t u hn ai hw\" height=\"814\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*r54-L9t14gqTbI6IlrW2wA.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*r54-L9t14gqTbI6IlrW2wA.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/1*r54-L9t14gqTbI6IlrW2wA.png 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*r54-L9t14gqTbI6IlrW2wA.png 700w\" width=\"2000\"/>\n              <noscript>\n               <img class=\"s t u hn ai\" height=\"814\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/4000/1*r54-L9t14gqTbI6IlrW2wA.png\"
