Susan Li\n                  </a>\n                 </span>\n                 <div class=\"hi r an h\">\n                  <a class=\"hj fg q hk hl hm hn ho bg hg hp hq hr hs ht hu hv aq b ar hw cm au hx hy df hz ia bj\" href=\"https://medium.com/m/signin?operation=register&amp;redirect=https%3A%2F%2Ftowardsdatascience.com%2Fnamed-entity-recognition-with-nltk-and-spacy-8c4a7d88e7da&amp;source=-731d8566944a-------------------------follow_byline-\" rel=\"noopener\">\n                   Follow\n                  </a>\n                 </div>\n                </div>\n               </span>\n              </div>\n             </div>\n             <span class=\"aq b ar as at au r av aw\">\n              <span class=\"aq cl ex as br ha hb hc hd he av\">\n               <div>\n                <a class=\"cq cr az ba bb bc bd be bf bg hf bj bk hg hh\" href=\"/named-entity-recognition-with-nltk-and-spacy-8c4a7d88e7da?source=post_page-----8c4a7d88e7da----------------------\" rel=\"noopener\">\n                 Aug 17, 2018\n                </a>\n                <!-- -->\n                \u00b7\n                <!-- -->\n                <!-- -->\n                6\n                <!-- -->\n                min read\n               </div>\n              </span>\n             </span>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n           <div class=\"n ib ic id ie if ig ih ii y\">\n            <div class=\"n o\">\n             <div class=\"ij r an\">\n              <a class=\"cq cr az ba bb bc bd be bf bg ik il bj bk hg hh\" href=\"//medium.com/p/8c4a7d88e7da/share/twitter?source=post_actions_header---------------------------\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n               <svg class=\"q\" height=\"29\" width=\"29\">\n                <path d=\"M22.05 7.54a4.47 4.47 0 0 0-3.3-1.46 4.53 4.53 0 0 0-4.53 4.53c0 .35.04.7.08 1.05A12.9 12.9 0 0 1 5 6.89a5.1 5.1 0 0 0-.65 2.26c.03 1.6.83 2.99 2.02 3.79a4.3 4.3 0 0 1-2.02-.57v.08a4.55 4.55 0 0 0 3.63 4.44c-.4.08-.8.13-1.21.16l-.81-.08a4.54 4.54 0 0 0 4.2 3.15 9.56 9.56 0 0 1-5.66 1.94l-1.05-.08c2 1.27 4.38 2.02 6.94 2.02 8.3 0 12.86-6.9 12.84-12.85.02-.24 0-.43 0-.65a8.68 8.68 0 0 0 2.26-2.34c-.82.38-1.7.62-2.6.72a4.37 4.37 0 0 0 1.95-2.51c-.84.53-1.81.9-2.83 1.13z\">\n                </path>\n               </svg>\n              </a>\n             </div>\n             <div class=\"ij r an\">\n              <button class=\"cq cr az ba bb bc bd be bf bg ik il bj bk hg hh\">\n               <svg class=\"q\" fill=\"none\" height=\"29\" viewbox=\"0 0 29 29\" width=\"29\">\n                <path d=\"M5 6.36C5 5.61 5.63 5 6.4 5h16.2c.77 0 1.4.61 1.4 1.36v16.28c0 .75-.63 1.36-1.4 1.36H6.4c-.77 0-1.4-.6-1.4-1.36V6.36z\">\n                </path>\n                <path clip-rule=\"evenodd\" d=\"M10.76 20.9v-8.57H7.89v8.58h2.87zm-1.44-9.75c1 0 1.63-.65 1.63-1.48-.02-.84-.62-1.48-1.6-1.48-.99 0-1.63.64-1.63 1.48 0 .83.62 1.48 1.59 1.48h.01zM12.35 20.9h2.87v-4.79c0-.25.02-.5.1-.7.2-.5.67-1.04 1.46-1.04 1.04 0 1.46.8 1.46 1.95v4.59h2.87v-4.92c0-2.64-1.42-3.87-3.3-3.87-1.55 0-2.23.86-2.61 1.45h.02v-1.24h-2.87c.04.8 0 8.58 0 8.58z\" fill=\"#fff\" fill-rule=\"evenodd\">\n                </path>\n               </svg>\n              </button>\n             </div>\n             <div class=\"ij r an\">\n              <a class=\"cq cr az ba bb bc bd be bf bg ik il bj bk hg hh\" href=\"//medium.com/p/8c4a7d88e7da/share/facebook?source=post_actions_header---------------------------\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n               <svg class=\"q\" height=\"29\" width=\"29\">\n                <path d=\"M23.2 5H5.8a.8.8 0 0 0-.8.8V23.2c0 .44.35.8.8.8h9.3v-7.13h-2.38V13.9h2.38v-2.38c0-2.45 1.55-3.66 3.74-3.66 1.05 0 1.95.08 2.2.11v2.57h-1.5c-1.2 0-1.48.57-1.48 1.4v1.96h2.97l-.6 2.97h-2.37l.05 7.12h5.1a.8.8 0 0 0 .79-.8V5.8a.8.8 0 0 0-.8-.79\">\n                </path>\n               </svg>\n              </a>\n             </div>\n             <div class=\"im r\">\n              <a class=\"cq cr az ba bb bc bd be bf bg ik il bj bk hg hh\" href=\"https://medium.com/m/signin?operation=register&amp;redirect=https%3A%2F%2Ftowardsdatascience.com%2Fnamed-entity-recognition-with-nltk-and-spacy-8c4a7d88e7da&amp;source=post_actions_header--------------------------bookmark_header-\" rel=\"noopener\">\n               <svg height=\"25\" viewbox=\"0 0 25 25\" width=\"25\">\n                <path d=\"M19 6a2 2 0 0 0-2-2H8a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v14.66h.01c.01.1.05.2.12.28a.5.5 0 0 0 .7.03l5.67-4.12 5.66 4.13a.5.5 0 0 0 .71-.03.5.5 0 0 0 .12-.29H19V6zm-6.84 9.97L7 19.64V6a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h9a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v13.64l-5.16-3.67a.49.49 0 0 0-.68 0z\" fill-rule=\"evenodd\">\n                </path>\n               </svg>\n              </a>\n             </div>\n             <div class=\"in r am\">\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </div>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"c0f2\">\n          <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Named-entity_recognition\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           Named entity recognition\n          </a>\n          (NER)is probably the first step towards information extraction that seeks to locate and classify\n          <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Named_entity\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           named entities\n          </a>\n          in text into pre-defined categories such as the names of persons, organizations, locations, expressions of times, quantities, monetary values, percentages, etc. NER is used in many fields in\n          <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natural_language_processing\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           Natural Language Processing\n          </a>\n          (NLP), and it can help answering many real-world questions, such as:\n         </p>\n         <ul class=\"\">\n          <li class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz je jf jg\" id=\"5e5e\">\n           Which companies were mentioned in the news article?\n          </li>\n          <li class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz jh gb ji it jj iv jk ix jl iz je jf jg\" id=\"1fc1\">\n           Were specified products mentioned in complaints or reviews?\n          </li>\n          <li class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz jh gb ji it jj iv jk ix jl iz je jf jg\" id=\"e489\">\n           Does the tweet contain the name of a person? Does the tweet contain this person\u2019s location?\n          </li>\n         </ul>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"946c\">\n          This article describes how to build named entity recognizer with\n          <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://www.nltk.org/book/ch07.html\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           NLTK\n          </a>\n          and\n          <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://spacy.io/usage/linguistic-features\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           SpaCy\n          </a>\n          , to identify the names of things, such as persons, organizations, or locations in the raw text. Let\u2019s get started!\n         </p>\n         <h1 class=\"jm jn fg ar aq jo fi jp fk jq jr js jt ju jv jw jx\" id=\"72af\">\n          NLTK\n         </h1>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"674f\">import nltk<br/>from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize<br/>from nltk.tag import pos_tag</span></pre>\n         <h2 class=\"kf jn fg ar aq jo kk kl km kn ko kp kq kr ks kt ku\" id=\"d83b\">\n          Information Extraction\n         </h2>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz kv gb kw it kx iv ky ix kz iz dl\" id=\"3215\">\n          I took a sentence from\n          <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2018/07/18/technology/google-eu-android-fine.html\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           The New York Times\n          </a>\n          , \u201cEuropean authorities fined Google a record $5.1 billion on Wednesday for abusing its power in the mobile phone market and ordered the company to alter its practices.\u201d\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"d34a\">ex = 'European authorities fined Google a record $5.1 billion on Wednesday for abusing its power in the mobile phone market and ordered the company to alter its practices'</span></pre>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"f622\">\n          Then we apply word tokenization and part-of-speech tagging to the sentence.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"1af3\">def preprocess(sent):<br/>    sent = nltk.word_tokenize(sent)<br/>    sent = nltk.pos_tag(sent)<br/>    return sent</span></pre>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"a4d5\">\n          Let\u2019s see what we get:\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"333d\">sent = preprocess(ex)<br/>sent</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"dc dd la\">\n           <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n            <div class=\"lb r\">\n             <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n              <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"606\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/44/1*KFG-dWUIatG6bJxJ4dhktg.png?q=20\" width=\"441\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"606\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"441px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*KFG-dWUIatG6bJxJ4dhktg.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/882/1*KFG-dWUIatG6bJxJ4dhktg.png 441w\" width=\"441\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u en ai\" height=\"606\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"441px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/882/1*KFG-dWUIatG6bJxJ4dhktg.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*KFG-dWUIatG6bJxJ4dhktg.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/882/1*KFG-dWUIatG6bJxJ4dhktg.png 441w\" width=\"441\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n           Figure 1\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"2917\">\n          We get a list of tuples containing the individual words in the sentence and their associated part-of-speech.\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"91cc\">\n          Now we\u2019ll implement noun phrase chunking to identify named entities using a regular expression consisting of rules that indicate how sentences should be chunked.\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"0f1b\">\n          Our chunk pattern consists of one rule, that a noun phrase, NP, should be formed whenever the chunker finds an optional determiner, DT, followed by any number of adjectives, JJ, and then a noun, NN.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"7c42\">pattern = 'NP: {&lt;DT&gt;?&lt;JJ&gt;*&lt;NN&gt;}'</span></pre>\n         <h2 class=\"kf jn fg ar aq jo kk kl km kn ko kp kq kr ks kt ku\" id=\"37f0\">\n          Chunking\n         </h2>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz kv gb kw it kx iv ky ix kz iz dl\" id=\"33fb\">\n          Using this pattern, we create a chunk parser and test it on our sentence.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"fc80\">cp = nltk.RegexpParser(pattern)<br/>cs = cp.parse(sent)<br/>print(cs)</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"dc dd lc\">\n           <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n            <div class=\"ld r\">\n             <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n              <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"649\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/48/1*3Gmd7LaEtAsuPmRSJZyxZg.png?q=20\" width=\"522\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"649\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"522px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*3Gmd7LaEtAsuPmRSJZyxZg.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1044/1*3Gmd7LaEtAsuPmRSJZyxZg.png 522w\" width=\"522\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u en ai\" height=\"649\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"522px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/1044/1*3Gmd7LaEtAsuPmRSJZyxZg.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*3Gmd7LaEtAsuPmRSJZyxZg.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1044/1*3Gmd7LaEtAsuPmRSJZyxZg.png 522w\" width=\"522\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n           Figure 2\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"0e53\">\n          The output can be read as a tree or a hierarchy with S as the first level, denoting sentence. we can also display it graphically.\n         </p>\n        </div>\n       </div>\n       <div class=\"dq\">\n        <div class=\"n p\">\n         <div class=\"dr ds dt du dv dw ae dx af dy ah ai\">\n          <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq ef eg paragraph-image\">\n           <div class=\"eh ei ej ek ai\">\n            <div class=\"dc dd le\">\n             <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n              <div class=\"lf r\">\n               <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n                <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"140\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png?q=20\" width=\"1882\"/>\n               </div>\n               <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"140\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"1000px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1456/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 728w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1632/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 816w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1808/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 904w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1984/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 992w, https://miro.medium.com/max/2000/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 1000w\" width=\"1882\"/>\n               <noscript>\n                <img class=\"s t u en ai\" height=\"140\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"1000px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/3764/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1456/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 728w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1632/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 816w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1808/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 904w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1984/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 992w, https://miro.medium.com/max/2000/1*y9DvFxsu3pCecI46yDwMxA.png 1000w\" width=\"1882\"/>\n               </noscript>\n              </div>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n           <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n            Figure 3\n           </figcaption>\n          </figure>\n         </div>\n        </div>\n       </div>\n       <div class=\"n p\">\n        <div class=\"z ab ac ae af fd ah ai\">\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"b2e7\">\n          IOB tags have become the standard way to represent chunk structures in files, and we will also be using this format.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"0159\">from nltk.chunk import conlltags2tree, tree2conlltags<br/>from pprint import pprint</span><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex lg lh li lj lk ki r kj\" id=\"f890\">iob_tagged = tree2conlltags(cs)<br/>pprint(iob_tagged)</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"eh ei ej ek ai\">\n           <div class=\"dc dd ll\">\n            <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n             <div class=\"lm r\">\n              <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n               <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"717\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/50/1*H2q7RsGUR3iCpgJVjXSw1Q.png?q=20\" width=\"599\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"717\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"599px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*H2q7RsGUR3iCpgJVjXSw1Q.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*H2q7RsGUR3iCpgJVjXSw1Q.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1198/1*H2q7RsGUR3iCpgJVjXSw1Q.png 599w\" width=\"599\"/>\n              <noscript>\n               <img class=\"s t u en ai\" height=\"717\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"599px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/1198/1*H2q7RsGUR3iCpgJVjXSw1Q.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*H2q7RsGUR3iCpgJVjXSw1Q.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*H2q7RsGUR3iCpgJVjXSw1Q.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1198/1*H2q7RsGUR3iCpgJVjXSw1Q.png 599w\" width=\"599\"/>\n              </noscript>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n           Figure 4\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"e392\">\n          In this representation, there is one token per line, each with its part-of-speech tag and its named entity tag. Based on this training corpus, we can construct a tagger that can be used to label new sentences; and use the nltk.chunk.conlltags2tree() function to convert the tag sequences into a chunk tree.\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"7d37\">\n          With the function nltk.ne_chunk(), we can recognize named entities using a classifier, the classifier adds category labels such as PERSON, ORGANIZATION, and GPE.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"6ddc\">ne_tree = ne_chunk(pos_tag(word_tokenize(ex)))<br/>print(ne_tree)</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"dc dd ln\">\n           <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n            <div class=\"lo r\">\n             <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n              <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"627\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/36/1*oWNyssn2LLeNrIus33tkyw.png?q=20\" width=\"380\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"627\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"380px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*oWNyssn2LLeNrIus33tkyw.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/760/1*oWNyssn2LLeNrIus33tkyw.png 380w\" width=\"380\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u en ai\" height=\"627\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"380px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/760/1*oWNyssn2LLeNrIus33tkyw.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*oWNyssn2LLeNrIus33tkyw.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/760/1*oWNyssn2LLeNrIus33tkyw.png 380w\" width=\"380\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n           Figure 5\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"a6b2\">\n          Google is recognized as a person. It\u2019s quite disappointing, don\u2019t you think so?\n         </p>\n         <h1 class=\"jm jn fg ar aq jo fi jp fk jq jr js jt ju jv jw jx\" id=\"f7a2\">\n          SpaCy\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz kv gb kw it kx iv ky ix kz iz dl\" id=\"d971\">\n          <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://spacy.io/api/annotation#section-named-entities\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           SpaCy\u2019s named entity recognition\n          </a>\n          has been trained on the\n          <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://catalog.ldc.upenn.edu/ldc2013t19\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           OntoNotes 5\n          </a>\n          corpus and it supports the following entity types:\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"eh ei ej ek ai\">\n           <div class=\"dc dd lp\">\n            <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n             <div class=\"lq r\">\n              <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n               <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"678\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*qQggIPMugLcy-ndJ8X_aAA.png?q=20\" width=\"912\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"678\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*qQggIPMugLcy-ndJ8X_aAA.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*qQggIPMugLcy-ndJ8X_aAA.png 552w, </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n           Figure 6 (Source: SpaCy)\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <h2 class=\"kf jn fg ar aq jo kk kl km kn ko kp kq kr ks kt ku\" id=\"bbc0\">\n          Entity\n         </h2>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"be6e\">import spacy<br/>from spacy import displacy<br/>from collections import Counter<br/>import en_core_web_sm<br/>nlp = en_core_web_sm.load()</span></pre>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"96f6\">\n          We are using the same sentence, \u201cEuropean authorities fined Google a record $5.1 billion on Wednesday for abusing its power in the mobile phone market and ordered the company to alter its practices.\u201d\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"1ff6\">\n          One of the nice things about Spacy is that we only need to apply nlp once, the entire background pipeline will return the objects.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"d6dc\">doc = nlp('European authorities fined Google a record $5.1 billion on Wednesday for abusing its power in the mobile phone market and ordered the company to alter its practices')<br/>pprint([(X.text, X.label_) for X in doc.ents])</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"eh ei ej ek ai\">\n           <div class=\"dc dd lr\">\n            <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n             <div class=\"ls r\">\n              <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n               <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"123\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*uoAnpkcIIKztaLU1ty7EDQ.png?q=20\" width=\"421\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"123\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"421px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*uoAnpkcIIKztaLU1ty7EDQ.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/842/1*uoAnpkcIIKztaLU1ty7EDQ.png 421w\" width=\"421\"/>\n              <noscript>\n               <img class=\"s t u en ai\" height=\"123\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"421px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/842/1*uoAnpkcIIKztaLU1ty7EDQ.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*uoAnpkcIIKztaLU1ty7EDQ.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/842/1*uoAnpkcIIKztaLU1ty7EDQ.png 421w\" width=\"421\"/>\n              </noscript>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n           Figure 7\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"5288\">\n          European is NORD (nationalities or religious or political groups), Google is an organization, $5.1 billion is monetary value and Wednesday is a date object. They are all correct.\n         </p>\n         <h2 class=\"kf jn fg ar aq jo kk kl km kn ko kp kq kr ks kt ku\" id=\"5eb0\">\n          Token\n         </h2>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz kv gb kw it kx iv ky ix kz iz dl\" id=\"4743\">\n          During the above example, we were working on entity level, in the following example, we are demonstrating token-level entity annotation using the BILUO tagging scheme to describe the entity boundaries.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"eh ei ej ek ai\">\n           <div class=\"dc dd lt\">\n            <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n             <div class=\"lu r\">\n              <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n               <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"418\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*_sYTlDj2p_p-pcSRK25h-Q.png?q=20\" width=\"792\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"418\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*_sYTlDj2p_p-pcSRK25h-Q.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*_sYTlDj2p_p-pcSRK25h-Q.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/1*_sYTlDj2p_p-pcSRK25h-Q.png 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*_sYTlDj2p_p-pcSRK25h-Q.png 700w\" width=\"792\"/>\n              <noscript>\n               <img class=\"s t u en ai\" height=\"418\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/1584/1*_sYTlDj2p_p-pcSRK25h-Q.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*_sYTlDj2p_p-pcSRK25h-Q.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*_sYTlDj2p_p-pcSRK25h-Q.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/1*_sYTlDj2p_p-pcSRK25h-Q.png 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*_sYTlDj2p_p-pcSRK25h-Q.png 700w\" width=\"792\"/>\n              </noscript>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n           Figure 8 (Source: SpaCy)\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"d59a\">pprint([(X, X.ent_iob_, X.ent_type_) for X in doc])</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"dc dd lv\">\n           <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n            <div class=\"lw r\">\n             <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n              <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"607\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/52/1*R7MQ6H8hFNXegvxB-BgMiw.png?q=20\" width=\"525\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"607\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"525px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*R7MQ6H8hFNXegvxB-BgMiw.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1050/1*R7MQ6H8hFNXegvxB-BgMiw.png 525w\" width=\"525\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u en ai\" height=\"607\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"525px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/1050/1*R7MQ6H8hFNXegvxB-BgMiw.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*R7MQ6H8hFNXegvxB-BgMiw.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1050/1*R7MQ6H8hFNXegvxB-BgMiw.png 525w\" width=\"525\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n           Figure 9\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"47c8\">\n          <code class=\"er lx ly lz kg b\">\n           \"B\"\n          </code>\n          means the token begins an entity,\n          <code class=\"er lx ly lz kg b\">\n           \"I\"\n          </code>\n          means it is inside an entity,\n          <code class=\"er lx ly lz kg b\">\n           \"O\"\n          </code>\n          means it is outside an entity, and\n          <code class=\"er lx ly lz kg b\">\n           \"\"\n          </code>\n          means no entity tag is set.\n         </p>\n         <h2 class=\"kf jn fg ar aq jo kk kl km kn ko kp kq kr ks kt ku\" id=\"28b3\">\n          Extracting named entity from an article\n         </h2>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz kv gb kw it kx iv ky ix kz iz dl\" id=\"0653\">\n          Now let\u2019s get serious with SpaCy and extracting named entities from a New York Times article, \u2014 \u201c\n          <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2018/08/13/us/politics/peter-strzok-fired-fbi.html?hp&amp;action=click&amp;pgtype=Homepage&amp;clickSource=story-heading&amp;module=first-column-region&amp;region=top-news&amp;WT.nav=top-news\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           F.B.I. Agent Peter Strzok, Who Criticized Trump in Texts, Is Fired\n          </a>\n          .\u201d\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"aac1\">from bs4 import BeautifulSoup<br/>import requests<br/>import re</span><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex lg lh li lj lk ki r kj\" id=\"5865\">def url_to_string(url):<br/>    res = requests.get(url)<br/>    html = res.text<br/>    soup = BeautifulSoup(html, 'html5lib')<br/>    for script in soup([\"script\", \"style\", 'aside']):<br/>        script.extract()<br/>    return \" \".join(re.split(r'[\\n\\t]+', soup.get_text()))</span><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex lg lh li lj lk ki r kj\" id=\"3e69\">ny_bb = url_to_string('https://www.nytimes.com/2018/08/13/us/politics/peter-strzok-fired-fbi.html?hp&amp;action=click&amp;pgtype=Homepage&amp;clickSource=story-heading&amp;module=first-column-region&amp;region=top-news&amp;WT.nav=top-news')<br/>article = nlp(ny_bb)<br/>len(article.ents)</span></pre>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"50eb\">\n          <strong class=\"iq ma\">\n           <em class=\"mb\">\n            188\n           </em>\n          </strong>\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"afa3\">\n          There are 188 entities in the article and they are represented as 10 unique labels:\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"e0c9\">labels = [x.label_ for x in article.ents]<br/>Counter(labels)</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"dc dd mc\">\n           <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n            <div class=\"md r\">\n             <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n              <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"273\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*sUjSb4dEuSk2w5bU8llgbw.png?q=20\" width=\"524\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"273\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"524px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*sUjSb4dEuSk2w5bU8llgbw.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1048/1*sUjSb4dEuSk2w5bU8llgbw.png 524w\" width=\"524\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u en ai\" height=\"273\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"524px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/1048/1*sUjSb4dEuSk2w5bU8llgbw.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*sUjSb4dEuSk2w5bU8llgbw.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1048/1*sUjSb4dEuSk2w5bU8llgbw.png 524w\" width=\"524\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n           Figure 10\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"27de\">\n          The following are three most frequent tokens.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"d3df\">items = [x.text for x in article.ents]<br/>Counter(items).most_common(3)</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq dc dd         </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"34d9\">\n          Let\u2019s randomly select one sentence to learn more.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"e75e\">sentences = [x for x in article.sents]<br/>print(sentences[20])</span></pre>\n iy iz dl\" id=\"110c\">\n          Let\u2019s run\n          <code class=\"er lx ly lz kg b\">\n           <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://spacy.io/api/top-level#displacy.render\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n            displacy.render\n           </a>\n          </code>\n          <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://spacy.io/api/top-level#displacy.render\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n          </a>\n          to generate the raw markup.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"535c\">displacy.render(nlp(str(sentences[20])), jupyter=True, style='ent')</span></pre>\n        </div>\n       </div>\n srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*JNHlyK5-jQA6JBKj3nDYcA.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*JNHlyK5-jQA6JBKj3nDYcA.png 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/1*JNHlyK5-jQA6JBKj3nDYcA.png 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1456/1*JNHlyK5-jQA6JBKj3nDYcA.png 728w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1632/1*JNHlyK5-jQA6JBKj3nDYcA.png 816w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1808/1*JNHlyK5-jQA6JBKj3nDYcA.png 904w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1984/1*JNHlyK5-jQA6JBKj3nDYcA.png 992w, https://miro.medium.com/max/2000/1*JNHlyK5-jQA6JBKj3nDYcA.png 1000w\" width=\"1451\"/>\n               </noscript>\n              </div>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n           <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n            Figure 13\n           </figcaption>\n          </figure>\n         </div>\n        </div>\n       </div>\n       <div class=\"n p\">\n        <div class=\"z ab ac ae af fd ah ai\">\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"1004\">\n          One miss-classification here is F.B.I. It is hard, isn\u2019t it?\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"9d64\">\n          Using spaCy\u2019s built-in\n          <a class=\"cq ia ja jb jc jd\" href=\"https://spacy.io/usage/visualizers\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n           displaCy visualizer\n          </a>\n          , here\u2019s what the above sentence and its dependencies look like:\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"bd41\">displacy.render(nlp(str(sentences[20])), style='dep', jupyter = True, options = {'distance': 120})</span></pre>\n        </div>\n       </div>\n       <div class=\"dq\">\n        <div class=\"n p\">\n         <div class=\"dr ds dt du dv dw ae dx af dy ah ai\">\n          <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq ef eg paragraph-image\">\n           <div class=\"eh ei ej ek ai\">\n            <div class=\"dc dd mk\">\n             <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n              <div class=\"ml r\">\n               <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n                <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"623\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*bJzRK3Lk8Jri26y7O7xBnA.png?q=20\" width=\"1506\"/>\n               </div>\n               <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" https://miro.medium.com/max/2000/1*bJzRK3Lk8Jri26y7O7xBnA.png 1000w\" width=\"1506\"/>\n               <noscript>\n                <img class=\"s t u en ai\" height=\"623\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"1000px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/3012/1*bJzRK3Lk8Jri26y7O7xBnA.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*bJzRK3Lk8Jri26y7O7xBnA.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1984/1*bJzRK3Lk8Jri26y7O7xBnA.png 992w, https://miro.medium.com/max/2000/1*bJzRK3Lk8Jri26y7O7xBnA.png 1000w\" width=\"1506\"/>\n               </noscript>\n              </div>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n           <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n            Figure 14\n           </figcaption>\n          </figure>\n         </div>\n        </div>\n       </div>\n       <div class=\"n p\">\n        <div class=\"z ab ac ae af fd ah ai\">\n         <p class=\"io ip fg ar iq b fz ir gb is it iu iv iw ix iy iz dl\" id=\"1fa5\">\n          Next, we verbatim, extract part-of-speech and lemmatize this sentence.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"a31d\">[(x.orth_,x.pos_, x.lemma_) for x in [y <br/>                                      for y<br/>                                      in nlp(str(sentences[20])) <br/>                                      if not y.is_stop and y.pos_ != 'PUNCT']]</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq dc dd paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"dc dd mm\">\n           <div class=\"eq r ej er\">\n            <div class=\"mn r\">\n             <div class=\"el em s t u en ai br eo ep\">\n              <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"575\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*1OyJd6gpq8hbbjzCYyxKlQ.png?q=20\" width=\"688\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"575\"           </div>\n          </div>\n          <figcaption class=\"av ex ey ez fa de dc dd fb fc aq cl\">\n           Figure 15\n          </figcaption>\n         </figure>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"56b9\">dict([(str(x), x.label_) for x in nlp(str(sentences[20])).ents])</span></pre>\n         <figure class=\"jy jz ka kb kc dq      <img class=\"s t u en ai et eu ev\" height=\"145\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/1*QKvX3tj62IiemjC8cdBAIA.png?q=20\" width=\"516\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"el em s t u en ai ew\" height=\"145\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"516px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*QKvX3tj62IiemjC8cdBAIA.png 276w, id=\"b70c\">\n          Named entity extraction are correct except \u201cF.B.I\u201d.\n         </p>\n         <pre class=\"jy jz ka kb kc kd ke ca\"><span class=\"kf jn fg ar kg b ex kh ki r kj\" id=\"8a68\">print([(x, x.ent_iob_, x.ent_type_) for x in sentences[20]])</span></pre>\n        </div>\n       </div>\n       <div class=\"dq\">\n        <div class=\"n p\">\n         <div class=\"dr href=\"/?source=post_page-----db3e8c0cce5e----------------------\" rel=\"noopener\">\n            <svg class=\"q\" height=\"35\" viewbox=\"5 5 35 35\" width=\"35\">\n             <path d=\"M5 40V5h35v35H5zm8.56-12.63c0 .56-.03.69-.32 1.03L10.8 31.4v.4h6.97v-.4L15.3 28.4c-.29-.34-.34-.5-.34-1.03v-8.95l6.13 13.36h.71l5.26-13.36v10.64c0 .3 0 .35-.19.53l-1.85 1.8v.4h9.2v-.4l-1.83-1.8c-.18-.18-.2-.24-.2-.53V15.94c0-.3.02-.35.2-.53l1.82-1.8v-.4h-6.47l-4.62 11.55-5.2-11.54h-6.8v.4l2.15 2.63c.24.3.29.37.29.77v10.35z\">\n             </path>\n        <div class=\"br r an\">\n           <a href=\"/wisio?source=post_page-----db3e8c0cce5e----------------------\" rel=\"noopener\">\n            <div class=\"bs bt r\">\n             <img
