0zm8.89 2.06c-.38-.56-.9-.92-1.49-1.01a1.74 1.74 0 0 0-1.34.33c-.38.29-.61.65-.71 1.06a2.1 2.1 0 0 0-1.1-.56 1.78 1.78 0 0 0-.99.13l-2.64-2.64a1.88 1.88 0 0 0-2.65 0 1.86 1.86 0 0 0-.48.85 1.89 1.89 0 0 0-2.67-.01 1.87 1.87 0 0 0-.5.9c-.76-.75-2-.75-2.7-.04a1.88 1.88 0 0 0 0 2.66c-.3.12-.61.29-.87.55a1.88 1.88 0 0 0 0 2.66l.62.62a1.88 1.88 0 0 0-.9 3.16l5.01 5.02c1.6 1.6 3.52 2.64 5.4 2.96a7.16        </a>\n           </div>\n           <div class=\"ka r\">\n            <div class=\"kb\">\n             <h4 class=\"aq cl fe as av\">\n              <button class=\"cq cr az ba bb bc bd be bf bg         </a>\n        </div>\n       </div>\n      </div>\n     </div>\n    </div>\n    <div class=\"hu dk it iu iv ey iw ix iy iz\">\n    </div>\n    <div>\n     <div class=\"kc ht n dg p\">\n      <div class=\"n p\">\n       <div class=\"z ab ac ae af dq ah ai\">\n        <div class=\"n kd\">\n         <div class=\"r\">\n          <h4 class=\"aq cl cm as av\">\n           Thanks to\n           <!-- -->\n           Aman Dalmia\n           <!-- -->\n           .\n          </h4>\n         </div>\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"n o kd\">\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"ke r\">\n         <ul class=\"be bf\">\n          <li class=\"ge bx gr kf\">\n           <a class=\"kg kh gf av r ki kj a b cm\" href=\"/tag/machine-learning\">\n            Machine Learning\n           </a>\n          </li>\n          <li class=\"ge bx gr kf\">\n           <a class=\"kg kh gf av r ki kj a b cm\" href=\"/tag/nlp\">\n            NLP\n           </a>\n          </li>\n          <li class=\"ge bx gr kf\">\n           <a class=\"kg kh gf av r ki kj a b cm\" href=\"/tag/deep-learning\">\n            Deep Learning\n           </a>\n          </li>\n          <li class=\"ge bx gr kf\">\n           <a class=\"kg kh gf av r ki kj a b cm\" href=\"/tag/data-science\">\n            Data Science\n           </a>\n          </li>\n         </ul>\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"kk n em y\">\n         <div class=\"n o\">\n          <div class=\"kl r eq\">\n           <a class=\"cq cr az ba bb bc bd be bf bg gp gq bj bk fl fm\" href=\"https://medium.com/m/signin?operation=register&amp;redirect=https%3A%2F%2Ftowardsdatascience.com%2Fintroduction-to-word-embedding-and-word2vec-652d0c2060fa&amp;source=post_actions_footer-----652d0c2060fa---------------------clap_footer-\" rel=\"noopener\">\n            <div class=\"c km fa n o kn eq ko kp kq kr ks kt ku kv kw kx ky kz la jn\">\n             <div class=\"be js jt ju jv jw lb jy o if fa n p lc u hw s t ai ay jz bi ld\">\n              <svg height=\"33\" viewbox=\"0 0 33 33\" width=\"33\">\n               <path d=\"M28.86 17.34l-3.64-6.4c-.3-.43-.71-.73-1.16-.8a1.12 1.12 0 0 0-.9.21c-.62.5-.73 1.18-.32 2.06l1.22 2.6 1.4 2.45c2.23 4.09 1.51 8-2.15 11.66a9.6 9.6 0 0 1-.8.71 6.53 6.53 0 0 0 4.3-2.1c3.82-3.82 3.57-7.87 2.05-10.39zm-6.25 11.08c3.35-3.35 4-6.78 1.98-10.47L21.2 12c-.3-.43-.71-.72-1.16-.8a1.12 1.12 0 0 0-.9.22c-.62.49-.74 1.18-.32 2.06l1.72 3.63a.5.5 0 0 1-.81.57l-8.91-8.9a1.33 1.33 0 0 0-1.89 1.88l5.3 5.3a.5.5 0 0 1-.71.7l-5.3-5.3-1.49-1.49c-.5-.5-1.38-.5-1.88 0a1.34 1.34 0 0 0 0 1.89l1.49 1.5 0 0 0-.39.95c0 .35.14.69.4.94l6.39 6.4c3.53 3.53 8.86 5.3 12.82 1.35zM12.73 9.26l5.68 5.68-.49-1.04c-.52-1.1-.43-2.13.22-2.89l-3.3-3.3a1.34 1.34 0 0 0-1.88 0 1.33 1.33 0 0 0-.4.94c0 .22.07.42.17.61zm14.79 19.18a7.46 7.46 0 0 1-6.41 2.31 7.92 7.92 0 0 1-3.67.9c-3.05 0-6.12-1.63-8.36-3.88l-6.4-6.4A2.31 2.31 0 0 1 2 19.72a2.33 2.33 0 0 1 1.92-2.3l-.87-.87a2.34 2.34 0 0 1 0-3.3 2.33 2.33 0 0 1 1.24-.64l-.14-.14a2.34 2.34 0 0 1 0-3.3 2.39 2.39 0 0 1 3.3 0l.14.14a2.33 2.33 0 0 1 3.95-1.24l.09.09c.09-.42.29-.83.62-1.16a2.34 2.34 0 0 1 3.3 0l3.38 3.39a2.17 2.17 0 0 1 1.27-.17c.54.08 1.03.35 1.45.76.1-.55.41-1.03.9-1.42a2.12 2.12 0 0 1 1.67-.4 2.8 2.8 0 0 1 1.85 1.25l3.65 6.43c1.7 2.83 2.03 7.37-2.2 11.6zM13.22.48l-1.92.89 2.37 2.83-.45-3.72zm8.48.88L19.78.5l-.44 3.7 2.36-2.84zM16.5 3.3L15.48 0h2.04L16.5 3.3z\" fill-rule=\"evenodd\">\n               </path>\n              </svg>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </a>\n          </div>\n          <div class=\"ka r\">\n           <div class=\"kb\">\n            <h4 class=\"aq cl fe as dt\">\n             <button class=\"cq cr az ba bb bc bd be bf bg gp gq bj bk fl fm\">\n              2.8K claps\n             </button>\n            </h4>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </div>\n         <div class=\"n o\">\n          <div class=\"go r an\">\n           <a class=\"cq cr az ba bb bc bd be bf bg gp gq bj bk fl fm\" href=\"//medium.com/p/652d0c2060fa/share/twitter?source=post_actions_footer---------------------------\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n            <svg class=\"q\" height=\"29\" width=\"29\">\n             <path d=\"M22.05 7.54a4.47 4.47 0 0 0-3.3-1.46 4.53 4.53 0 0 0-4.53 4.53c0 .35.04.7.08 1.05A12.9 12.9 0 0 1 5 6.89a5.1 5.1 0 0 0-.65 2.26c.03 1.6.83 2.99 2.02 3.79a4.3 4.3 0 0 1-2.02-.57v.08a4.55 4.55 0 0 0 3.63 4.44c-.4.08-.8.13-1.21.16l-.81-.08a4.54 4.54 0 0 0 4.2 3.15 9.56 9.56 0 0 1-5.66 1.94l-1.05-.08c2 1.27 4.38 2.02 6.94 2.02 8.3 0 12.86-6.9 12.84-12.85.02-.24 0-.43 0-.65a8.68 8.68 0 0 0 2.26-2.34c-.82.38-1.7.62-2.6.72a4.37 4.37 0 0 0 1.95-2.51c-.84.53-1.81.9-2.83 1.13z\">\n             </path>\n            </svg>\n           </a>\n          </div>\n          <div class=\"go r an\">\n           <button class=\"cq cr az ba bb bc bd be bf bg gp gq bj bk fl fm\">\n            <svg class=\"q\" fill=\"none\" </div>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </figure>\n         </div>\n        </div>\n       </div>\n       <div class=\"n p\">\n        <div class=\"z ab ac ae af ev ah ai\">\n         <div>\n          <div class=\"ew ex ey ar ez b fa fb fc fd fe ff fg fh fi fj fk\" id=\"0384\">\n           <h1 class=\"ez b fa fl fc fm fe fn fg fo fi fp ey\">\n            25 Chatbot Platforms: A Comparative Table\n           </h1>\n          </div>\n          <div class=\"fq\">\n           <div class=\"n fr fs ft fu\">\n            <div class=\"o n\">\n             <div>\n              <a href=\"/@datamonsters?source=post_page-----aeefc932eaff----------------------\" rel=\"noopener\">\n               <img alt=\"Data Monsters\" class=\"r fv fw fx\" height=\"48\"       <span class=\"aq b ar as at au r av aw\">\n               <span class=\"aq cj gb as br gc gd ge gf gg av\">\n                <div>\n                 <a class=\"co cp az ba bb bc bd be bf bg gh    <div class=\"hl r an\">\n               <a class=\"co cp az ba bb bc bd be bf bg hm hn bj bk gi gj\" </a>\n              </div>\n              <div class=\"hl r an\">\n               <button class=\"co cp az ba bb bc bd be bf bg hm hn bj bk gi gj\">\n                <svg class=\"q\" fill=\"none\"                 </path>\n                 <path clip-rule=\"evenodd\" d=\"M10.76 20.9v-8.57H7.89v8.58h2.87zm-1.44-9.75c1 0 1.63-.65 1.63-1.48-.02-.84-.62-1.48-1.6-1.48-.99 0-1.63.64-1.63 1.48 0 .83.62 8.58 0 8.58z\" fill=\"#fff\" fill-rule=\"evenodd\">\n                 </path>\n                </svg>\n               </button>\n              </div>\n              <div class=\"hl r an\">\n               <a class=\"co cp az ba bb bc bd be bf bg hm hn bj bk gi gj\" href=\"//medium.com/p/aeefc932eaff/share/facebook?source=post_actions_header---------------------------\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\" target=\"_blank\">\n                <svg class=\"q\" height=\"29\" width=\"29\">\n                 <path d=\"M23.2 5H5.8a.8.8 0 0 0-.8.8V23.2c0 .44.35.8.8.8h9.3v-7.13h-2.38V13.9h2.38v-2.38c0-2.45 </svg>\n               </a>\n              </div>\n              <div class=\"ho r\">\n               <a class=\"co cp az ba bb bc bd be bf bg hm hn bj bk gi gj\" href=\"https://medium.com/m/signin?operation=register&amp;redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fchatbotsjournal.com%2F25-chatbot-platforms-a-comparative-table-aeefc932eaff&amp;source=post_actions_header--------------------------bookmark_header-\" rel=\"noopener\">\n                <svg height=\"25\" viewbox=\"0 0 25 25\" width=\"25\">\n                 <path d=\"M19 6a2 2 0 0 0-2-2H8a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v14.66h.01c.01.1.05.2.12.28a.5.5 0 0 0 .7.03l5.67-4.12 5.66 4.13a.5.5 0 0 0 .71-.03.5.5 0 0 0 .12-.29H19V6zm-6.84 9.97L7 19.64V6a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h9a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v13.64l-5.16-3.67a.49.49 0 0 0-.68 0z\" fill-rule=\"evenodd\">\n                 </path>\n                </svg>\n               </a>\n              </div>\n              <div class=\"hp r am\">\n              </div>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </div>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht hu hv hw hx hy hz ia ib ic id dj\" id=\"341a\">\n          <em class=\"ie\">\n           by Olga Davydova\n          </em>\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht hu hv hw hx hy hz ia ib ic id dj\" id=\"3bf7\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://analyticsindiamag.com/2016-year-chatbots-getting-bigger/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           Many experts\n          </a>\n          called 2016 \u201cthe year of the chatbots.\u201d Thousands of chatbots already help businesses improve customer service, sell more, and increase earnings. This paper reports a Data Monsters overview of research on the best-known platforms for building chatbots.\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht hu hv hw hx hy hz ia ib ic id dj\" id=\"01ba\">\n          The relevance of this research is proved by the massive deployment of chatbots. Indeed, today chatbots are used to solve a number of business tasks across many industries like\n          <em class=\"ie\">\n           E-Commerce, Insurance, Banking, Healthcare, Finance, Legal, Telecom, Logistics, Retail, Auto, Leisure, Travel, Sports, Entertainment, Media\n          </em>\n          and many others. Gartner Summits\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.gartner.com/imagesrv/summits/docs/na/customer-360/C360_2011_brochure_FINAL.pdf\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [1]\n          </a>\n          projects that more than 85% of customer interactions will be managed without a human by 2020. Chatbots are expected to be the number one consumer application of AI over the next five years according to TechEmergence\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.slideshare.net/TechEmergence/ai-founders-and-executives-predict-5year-trends-on-consumer-tech\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [2]\n          </a>\n          .\n         </p>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"9085\">\n          Results of the research\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"591a\">\n          25 of the best-known platforms for building chatbots, such as\n          <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n           IBM Watson, Microsoft Bot Framework, LUIS, Wit.ai, Api.ai, Chatfuel,\n          </strong>\n          and others were studied, and a comparative table was composed.\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht hu hv hw hx hy hz ia ib ic id dj\" id=\"3079\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1RgG-dRS42EHlG7QdJOTg2ZO587KutTTPeUfyxVKoIn8/edit#gid=0\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           Link to the chatbots\u2019 comparative table (Google spreadsheet).\n          </a>\n         </p>\n        </div>\n       </div>\n       <div class=\"do ai\">\n        <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do ai paragraph-image\">\n         <div class=\"ef eg eh ei ai\">\n          <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n           <div class=\"jg r\">\n            <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n             <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"8755\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/20/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png?q=20\" width=\"3005\"/>\n            </div>\n            <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"8755\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"100vw\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 552w, 816w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1808/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 904w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1984/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 992w, https://miro.medium.com/max/2160/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 1080w, https://miro.medium.com/max/2700/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 1350w, https://miro.medium.com/max/3240/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 1620w, https://miro.medium.com/max/3780/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 1890w, https://miro.medium.com/max/4320/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 2160w, https://miro.medium.com/max/4800/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 2400w\" width=\"3005\"/>\n            <noscript>\n             <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"8755\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"100vw\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/6010/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 276w, 728w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1632/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 816w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1808/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 904w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1984/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 992w, https://miro.medium.com/max/2160/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 1080w, https://miro.medium.com/max/2700/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 1350w, https://miro.medium.com/max/3240/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 1620w, https://miro.medium.com/max/3780/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 1890w, https://miro.medium.com/max/4320/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 2160w, https://miro.medium.com/max/4800/1*79rSiR14JE04saronJ6x3w.png 2400w\" width=\"3005\"/>\n            </noscript>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </div>\n        </figure>\n       </div>\n       <div class=\"n p\">\n        <div class=\"z ab ac ae af ev ah ai\">\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht hu hv hw hx hy hz ia ib ic id dj\" id=\"c7af\">\n          Below is an overview of the most popular bot platforms.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"ef eg eh ei ai\">\n           <div class=\"da db jh\">\n            <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n             <div class=\"ji r\">\n              <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"669\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*I4CXKlIngKPdRLnp.?q=20\" width=\"1600\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"669\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*I4CXKlIngKPdRLnp. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*I4CXKlIngKPdRLnp. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*I4CXKlIngKPdRLnp. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*I4CXKlIngKPdRLnp. 700w\" width=\"1600\"/>\n              <noscript>\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"669\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/3200/0*I4CXKlIngKPdRLnp.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*I4CXKlIngKPdRLnp. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*I4CXKlIngKPdRLnp. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*I4CXKlIngKPdRLnp. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*I4CXKlIngKPdRLnp. 700w\" width=\"1600\"/>\n              </noscript>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"983c\">\n          IBM Watson\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"e4d6\">\n          According to the research study by Mindbowser in association with\n          <em class=\"ie\">\n           Chatbots Journal\n          </em>\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://mindbowser.com/chatbot-market-survey-2017/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [3]\n          </a>\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.ibm.com/watson/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            IBM Watson\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          is the first choice as a bot-building platform for 61% of businesses. One of the Watson\u2019s most important parts is a Conversation Service. It is built on a neural network (one billion Wikipedia words), understands intents, interprets entities and dialogs, supports English and Japanese languages, and provides developer tools like Node SDK (Software Development Kit), Java SDK, Python SDK, iOS SDK and Unity SDK. IBM offers free, standard, and premium plans\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.ibm.com/watson/developercloud/conversation.html\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [4]\n          </a>\n          .\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht hu hv hw hx hy hz ia ib ic id dj\" id=\"6374\">\n          Royal Bank of Scotland launched Luvo, a chat bot taught to answer customers\u2019 questions in near-real time. It routes overly complex requests to advisers using IBM Watson Conversation\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.americanbanker.com/news/royal-bank-of-scotland-to-launch-chat-bot-with-ibm-watson\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [5]\n          </a>\n          . Typical questions it answers with staff via the web chat include: I have lost my card \u2014 what steps do I need to take now? I have locked my PIN \u2014 how do I unlock it? How do I order a card reader for my business?\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"da db jj\">\n           <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n            <div class=\"jk r\">\n             <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"300\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*jQMP2V-oANIs3KyE.?q=20\" width=\"300\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"300\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"300px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*jQMP2V-oANIs3KyE. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/600/0*jQMP2V-oANIs3KyE. 300w\" width=\"300\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"300\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"300px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/600/0*jQMP2V-oANIs3KyE.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*jQMP2V-oANIs3KyE. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/600/0*jQMP2V-oANIs3KyE. 300w\" width=\"300\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"54ab\">\n          Microsoft Bot Framework\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"7575\">\n          Forty-one percent of the businesses in Mindbowser\u2019s study\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://mindbowser.com/chatbot-market-survey-2017/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [3]\n          </a>\n          said they prefer\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://dev.botframework.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Microsoft Bot Framework\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          . It has its own Bot Builder SDK that includes .NET SDK and Node.js SDK. The entire system consists of three parts: Bot Connector, Developer Portal, and Bot Directory. The framework provides the Direct Line REST API, which can be used to host a bot in an application or website\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://docs.botframework.com/en-us/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [6]\n          </a>\n          . It is open source and available to all on Github, and it supports automatic translation to more than 30 languages. Microsoft Bot Framework understands users\u2019 intents. It is possible to incorporate LUIS for natural language understanding, Cortana for voice, and the Bing APIs for search.\n         </p>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht hu hv hw hx hy hz ia ib ic id dj\" id=\"175a\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.microsoft.com/cognitive-services/en-us/language-understanding-intelligent-service-luis\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Microsoft Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          uses intents and entities. All its applications are centered on a domain-specific topic or are content related. Active learning technology is one of LUIS\u2019s features. It is possible to use pre-existing, world-class, pre-built models from Bing and Cortana. Models deployment to an HTTP endpoint is a one-click operation; it returns easy-to-use JavaScript Object Notation (JSON). LUIS offers a set of programmatic REST APIs that can be used by developers to automate the application creation process. In addition, several SDKs are available: C# SDK, Python SDK, Node JS SDK, and Android SDK\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.microsoft.com/cognitive-services/en-us/language-understanding-intelligent-service-luis\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [7]\n          </a>\n          . Supported languages are English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Japanese, Korean and Chinese. LUIS offers free and standard plans.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"da db jl\">\n           <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n            <div class=\"jm r\">\n             <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"200\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*bDcoctEG-6-74piG.?q=20\" width=\"304\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"200\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"304px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*bDcoctEG-6-74piG. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/608/0*bDcoctEG-6-74piG. 304w\" width=\"304\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"200\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"304px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/608/0*bDcoctEG-6-74piG.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*bDcoctEG-6-74piG. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/608/0*bDcoctEG-6-74piG. 304w\" width=\"304\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"e631\">\n          Wit.ai\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"4d8e\">\n          Forty-five percent of the respondents in a study by Mindbowser [\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://mindbowser.com/chatbot-market-survey-2017/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           3\n          </a>\n          ] said they trust\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://wit.ai/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Wit.ai\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          more than any other bot-building platform. By April 2017, it was used by over 100,000 developers\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://wit.ai/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [8]\n          </a>\n          . Wit.ai allows using entities, intents, contexts, and actions, and it incorporates natural language processing (NLP). There are several clients: Node.js, Python, Ruby, and HTTP API for other platforms. It is available for developers to use with iOS, Android, Windows Phone, Raspberry Pi, Python, C, and Rust; it also has a JavaScript plugin. Wit.ai supports about 50 languages, and it is free.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"da db jn\">\n           <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n            <div class=\"jo r\">\n             <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"378\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/46/0*LsZjifArmibIHmtI.?q=20\" width=\"288\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"378\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"288px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*LsZjifArmibIHmtI. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/576/0*LsZjifArmibIHmtI. 288w\" width=\"288\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"378\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"288px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/576/0*LsZjifArmibIHmtI.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*LsZjifArmibIHmtI. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/576/0*LsZjifArmibIHmtI. 288w\" width=\"288\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"fb54\">\n          Api.ai\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"a587\">\n          Another conversational platform for bots, applications, services, and devices is\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://api.ai/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Api.ai\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n           .\n          </strong>\n          Api.ai matches the query to the most suitable intent based on information contained in the intent (examples, entities used for annotations, contexts, parameters, events) and the agent\u2019s machine learning model. Api.ai transforms the query text into actionable data and returns output data as a JSON response object. There are predefined knowledge packages collected over several years. Available SDKs are Android, iOS, Cordova, HTML, JavaScript, Node.js, .NET, Unity, Xamarin, C++, Python, Ruby, PHP, Epson Moverio, Botkit, and Java. Brazilian Portuguese, Chinese English, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, and Ukrainian are the languages Api.ai can support. The platform is free. Google bought Api.ai in September 2016. Now it is possible to integrate your Api.ai agent with Actions on Google that lets you build applications for the Google Assistant, which is the only assistant in Google Home. Google Home enables users to interact with services through voice commands.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"da db jp\">\n           <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n            <div class=\"jq r\">\n             <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"204\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*U103TY8KyvmQtIU7.?q=20\" width=\"362\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"204\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"362px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*U103TY8KyvmQtIU7. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/724/0*U103TY8KyvmQtIU7. 362w\" width=\"362\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"204\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"362px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/724/0*U103TY8KyvmQtIU7.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*U103TY8KyvmQtIU7. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/724/0*U103TY8KyvmQtIU7. 362w\" width=\"362\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"a573\">\n          Semantic Machines\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"5e83\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://www.semanticmachines.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Semantic Machines\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          created a proprietary conversational AI. The features of the system include a conversation engine, speech synthesis, deep learning, reinforcement learning, speech recognition, semantic intent extraction, and language generation (NLG) technology\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://www.semanticmachines.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [9]\n          </a>\n          . Semantic Machines goes beyond understanding commands to understanding conversations. The platform is language independent.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"ef eg eh ei ai\">\n           <div class=\"da db jh\">\n            <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n             <div class=\"jr r\">\n              <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"432\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*ru1czQxjSOZ-fL12.?q=20\" width=\"1600\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"432\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*ru1czQxjSOZ-fL12. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*ru1czQxjSOZ-fL12. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*ru1czQxjSOZ-fL12. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*ru1czQxjSOZ-fL12. 700w\" width=\"1600\"/>\n              <noscript>\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"432\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/3200/0*ru1czQxjSOZ-fL12.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*ru1czQxjSOZ-fL12. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*ru1czQxjSOZ-fL12. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*ru1czQxjSOZ-fL12. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*ru1czQxjSOZ-fL12. 700w\" width=\"1600\"/>\n              </noscript>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"1c1e\">\n          DigitalGenius\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"5116\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.digitalgenius.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            DigitalGenius\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          developed Human + AI Customer Service. It\u2019s not exactly a chatbot platform, but rather a deep learning agent efficiency tool that works in any language.\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://twitter.com/hashtag/AI?src=hash\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n          </a>\n          AI predicts case metadata and suggests the right answers to your customer service agents. AI learns from every agent interaction. It leverages a deep neural network model, word vectors, statistical operations, and deep learning algorithms\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.digitalgenius.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [10]\n          </a>\n          . Human + AI Customer Service installs as a layer into existing customer service software like Salesforce, Zendesk, etc.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"da db js\">\n           <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n            <div class=\"jt r\">\n             <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"212\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*Pjk5rRimSr0KcMjE.?q=20\" width=\"375\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"212\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"375px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*Pjk5rRimSr0KcMjE. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/750/0*Pjk5rRimSr0KcMjE. 375w\" width=\"375\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"212\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"375px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/750/0*Pjk5rRimSr0KcMjE.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*Pjk5rRimSr0KcMjE. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/750/0*Pjk5rRimSr0KcMjE. 375w\" width=\"375\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"8520\">\n          Chatfuel\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"5878\">\n          More than 360,000 chatbots have been created using\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://chatfuel.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Chatfuel\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          , serving more than 17 million users globally\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://chatfuel.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [11]\n          </a>\n          . A block is a basic building tool of a bot. It consists of one or more message cards that are sent together to a bot user. The next step is to link blocks with each other using buttons in text cards or in gallery cards. Many plugins were developed: Google search, Bing search, JSON API, RSS Import, Subscribe plugin, Digest, IFTTT, Zapier, user input, and LiveChat. Chatfuel supports about 50 languages, and it is free.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"ef eg eh ei ai\">\n           <div class=\"da db ju\">\n            <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n             <div class=\"jv r\">\n              <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"158\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*ISLnd4Lhtx7ml_G-.?q=20\" width=\"809\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"158\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*ISLnd4Lhtx7ml_G-. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*ISLnd4Lhtx7ml_G-. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*ISLnd4Lhtx7ml_G-. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*ISLnd4Lhtx7ml_G-. 700w\" width=\"809\"/>\n              <noscript>\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"158\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/1618/0*ISLnd4Lhtx7ml_G-.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*ISLnd4Lhtx7ml_G-. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*ISLnd4Lhtx7ml_G-. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*ISLnd4Lhtx7ml_G-. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*ISLnd4Lhtx7ml_G-. 700w\" width=\"809\"/>\n              </noscript>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"cc81\">\n          Pypestream\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"235c\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.pypestream.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Pypestream\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          \u2019s Smart Messaging Platform uses a patented framework of \u2018Pypes\u2019 and \u2018Streams\u2019 for natural language processing and keyword parsing. An open and flexible API platform allows custom integrations and development of third party connectors, plugins, and extensions. The platform includes the Smart Messaging Framework, Pypeconnect SDK, Pypemanager, the Pypestream mobile app, as well as API plug-ins and integrations\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.pypestream.com/platform/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [12]\n          </a>\n          . By April 2016, the company had 500 businesses signed up and using the messaging platform, including Washington Gas and Billboard.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"ef eg eh ei ai\">\n           <div class=\"da db jw\">\n            <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n             <div class=\"jx r\">\n              <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"181\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*KRSBBICOgP0El08e.?q=20\" width=\"1134\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"181\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*KRSBBICOgP0El08e. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*KRSBBICOgP0El08e. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*KRSBBICOgP0El08e. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*KRSBBICOgP0El08e. 700w\" width=\"1134\"/>\n              <noscript>\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"181\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/2268/0*KRSBBICOgP0El08e.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*KRSBBICOgP0El08e. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*KRSBBICOgP0El08e. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*KRSBBICOgP0El08e. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*KRSBBICOgP0El08e. 700w\" width=\"1134\"/>\n              </noscript>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"05cf\">\n          Pandorabots\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"8518\">\n          The\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.pandorabots.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Pandorabots\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          API allows you to integrate a bot hosting service and natural language processing engine into your own application. Developed SDKs are Java, Node.js, Python, Ruby, PHP, and Go. Pandorabots uses AIML (Artificial Intelligence Markup Language) and includes A.L.I.C.E. (The Artificial Linguistic Internet Computer Entity) \u2014 a natural language processing chatterbot. It is multilingual\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.pandorabots.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [13]\n          </a>\n          . Common use cases include advertising, virtual assistance, e-learning, entertainment, and education. Academics and universities use the platform for teaching and research. Pandorabots is an AIaaS platform \u2014 Artificial Intelligence as a Service.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"ef eg eh ei ai\">\n           <div class=\"da db jh\">\n            <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n             <div class=\"jy r\">\n              <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"400\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*N0Y2wXL9wLc9GTtK.?q=20\" width=\"1600\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"400\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*N0Y2wXL9wLc9GTtK. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*N0Y2wXL9wLc9GTtK. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*N0Y2wXL9wLc9GTtK. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*N0Y2wXL9wLc9GTtK. 700w\" width=\"1600\"/>\n              <noscript>\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"400\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/3200/0*N0Y2wXL9wLc9GTtK.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*N0Y2wXL9wLc9GTtK. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*N0Y2wXL9wLc9GTtK. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*N0Y2wXL9wLc9GTtK. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*N0Y2wXL9wLc9GTtK. 700w\" width=\"1600\"/>\n              </noscript>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"fc2a\">\n          AgentBot\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"32d6\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://agentbot.net/en/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            AgentBot\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          was specially developed for Latin America so it supports English, Spanish, and Portuguese languages. It uses Aivo\u2019s own natural language processing technology. The platform understands natural language, has memory to maintain coherence during long conversations, gathers customer information to deliver customized solutions, applies continuous evolution, and clarifies intents\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://agentbot.net/en/solution/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [14]\n          </a>\n          . AgentBot integrates with any CRM, internal system, human chat, or third party application. For integration, REST API is used.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"ef eg eh ei ai\">\n           <div class=\"da db jz\">\n            <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n             <div class=\"ka r\">\n              <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"334\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*LomZRktnigG-aCZo.?q=20\" width=\"1300\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"334\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*LomZRktnigG-aCZo. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*LomZRktnigG-aCZo. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*LomZRktnigG-aCZo. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*LomZRktnigG-aCZo. 700w\" width=\"1300\"/>\n              <noscript>\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"334\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/2600/0*LomZRktnigG-aCZo.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*LomZRktnigG-aCZo. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*LomZRktnigG-aCZo. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*LomZRktnigG-aCZo. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*LomZRktnigG-aCZo. 700w\" width=\"1300\"/>\n              </noscript>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"0656\">\n          ChatterBot\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"7ae0\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://chatterbot.readthedocs.io/en/stable/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            ChatterBot\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          is a Python library that makes it possible to generate responses based on collections of known conversations\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://chatterbot.readthedocs.io/en/stable/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [15]\n          </a>\n          . ChatterBot is language independent. The software license is the\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           3-Clause BSD License\n          </a>\n          .\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"da db kb\">\n           <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n            <div class=\"kc r\">\n             <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"164\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*4PgX6l6b1VHzewp-.?q=20\" width=\"182\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"164\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"182px\" srcset=\"\" width=\"182\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"164\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/364/0*4PgX6l6b1VHzewp-.\" width=\"182\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"6252\">\n          Chatscript\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"e79a\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://github.com/bwilcox-1234/ChatScript\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            ChatScript\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n          </strong>\n          is the next generation chatbot engine that has won the Loebner\u2019s 4 times and is the basis for natural language company for a variety of tech startups. ChatScript is a rule-based engine. Rules are created in program scripts through a process called dialog flow scripting. These use a scripting metalanguage (a script) as their source code\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://github.com/bwilcox-1234/ChatScript\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [16]\n          </a>\n          . ChatScript engine has many features like powerful pattern matching aimed at detecting meaning, simple rule layout combined with C-style general scripting, built-in WordNet dictionary, extensive extensible ontology, local machine control via popen/tcpopen/jsonopen, structured JSON data reading from websites, and others. ChatScript runs on Windows, Linux, Mac, iOS, or Android. It has integrated tools to support maintaining and testing large systems. UTF8 support allows scripts written in any language. ChatScript works under the\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           MIT License\n          </a>\n          .\n         </p>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"2345\">\n          Newer startups\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"d19c\">\n          Platforms like\n          <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n           IBM Watson, Microsoft Bot Framework, Api.ai, ChatScript\n          </strong>\n          and\n          <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n           Pandorabots\n          </strong>\n          were developed ten or more years ago. Therefore, their experience provides the most advanced tools and offers the most flexible solutions for businesses. These platforms make it possible to use different programming languages. Each platform has developed its own SDKs, uses cutting edge data processing and analysis technologies, supports dozens of natural languages, and are already embedded in customer services, sales, marketing, order processing, social media, payment, recruitment and other industries. Just the same, many startups were created over last few years. Some of them grow fast and are already well-known:\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"da db kd\">\n           <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n            <div class=\"ke r\">\n             <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"201\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/58/0*EbPZKjXe2bK9V89o.?q=20\" width=\"196\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"201\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"196px\" srcset=\"\" width=\"196\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"201\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/392/0*EbPZKjXe2bK9V89o.\" width=\"196\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"2efd\">\n          Twyla\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"1083\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.twylahelps.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Twyla\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          learns from agent/customer live chats, blends machine learning and rule-based methods, answers questions, and deflects tickets\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.twylahelps.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [17]\n          </a>\n          .\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"da db kf\">\n           <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n            <div class=\"kg r\">\n             <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"143\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*uKuJRQNKjXHDG1Hq.?q=20\" width=\"400\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"143\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"400px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*uKuJRQNKjXHDG1Hq. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/800/0*uKuJRQNKjXHDG1Hq. 400w\" width=\"400\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"143\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"400px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/800/0*uKuJRQNKjXHDG1Hq.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*uKuJRQNKjXHDG1Hq. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/800/0*uKuJRQNKjXHDG1Hq. 400w\" width=\"400\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"0b74\">\n          Msg.ai\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"832f\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://netomi.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Netomi.com\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n          </strong>\n          integrates with popular customer support offerings while leveraging intent models and tone classifications\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://msg.ai/index.html#features\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [18]\n          </a>\n          . It supports deep learning, interactive smart cards, and A/B testing.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"ef eg eh ei ai\">\n           <div class=\"da db kh\">\n            <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n             <div class=\"ki r\">\n              <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n               <img class=\"s t u ai\" height=\"282\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/1720/0*7kRmxHeLoG3loJ8J.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*7kRmxHeLoG3loJ8J. 276w,         </noscript>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"aa99\">\n          Rasa NLU\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"5ebe\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://rasa.ai/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Rasa NLU\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          has HTTP API and Python support, intent classification, and entity extraction\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://rasa.ai/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [19]\n          </a>\n          ; it is an open source tool that runs locally.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"da db jj\">\n           <div class=\"eo r eh <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"300\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"300px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/600/0*PIudq-asmdC1i9jD.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*PIudq-asmdC1i9jD. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/600/0*PIudq-asmdC1i9jD. 300w\" width=\"300\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"d030\">\n          Reply.ai\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"280f\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.reply.ai/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            Reply.ai\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          is a visual bot builder that easily leverages natural language processing (NLP) engines wit.ai and api.ai for your advanced use cases\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://www.reply.ai/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [20]\n          </a>\n          with analytics about every single response from your users.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"ef eg eh ei ai\">\n           <div class=\"da db kj\">\n            <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n             <div class=\"kk r\">\n              <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"620\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*57L4NpKIwpKmFUZo.?q=20\" width=\"930\"/>\n              </div>\n              <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"620\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*57L4NpKIwpKmFUZo. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*57L4NpKIwpKmFUZo. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*57L4NpKIwpKmFUZo. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*57L4NpKIwpKmFUZo. 700w\" width=\"930\"/>\n              <noscript>\n               <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"620\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"700px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/1860/0*57L4NpKIwpKmFUZo.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*57L4NpKIwpKmFUZo. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1104/0*57L4NpKIwpKmFUZo. 552w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1280/0*57L4NpKIwpKmFUZo. 640w, https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*57L4NpKIwpKmFUZo. 700w\" width=\"930\"/>\n              </noscript>\n             </div>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"29c4\">\n          ManyChat\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"9bfa\">\n          The basic functionality of\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://manychat.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            ManyChat\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n          </strong>\n          lets you welcome new users, send them content, schedule posts, set up keyword auto-responses (text, pictures, menus), automatically broadcast your RSS feed, and much more\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://manychat.com/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [21]\n          </a>\n          . No coding is required. It is free.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"da db kl\">\n           <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n            <div class=\"kk r\">\n             <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"300\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*ypvVTKVDnQMGXKaf.?q=20\" width=\"450\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"300\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"450px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*ypvVTKVDnQMGXKaf. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/900/0*ypvVTKVDnQMGXKaf. 450w\" width=\"450\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"300\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"450px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/900/0*ypvVTKVDnQMGXKaf.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*ypvVTKVDnQMGXKaf. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/900/0*ypvVTKVDnQMGXKaf. 450w\" width=\"450\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"a0c7\">\n          KITT.AI\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"18cf\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://kitt.ai/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            KITT.AI\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          built its proprietary ChatFlow platform that enables users to create conversational agents, or smart bots, using a simple drag-and-drop interface that visually describes a dialogue and at the same time implements the flow that can be executed on the server as the dialogue is designed. The features of the platform are hotword detection (no internet required), semantic parsing, natural language understanding, conversational engine (multi-turn support), and neural network powered machine learning model\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"http://kitt.ai/#technologies\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [22]\n          </a>\n          . ChatFlow supports Alexa, Facebook Messenger, Kik, Skype, Slack, Telegram, and Twilio. The platform is free now and lets you sign up for the beta. In the future the team is going to provide free or cheap access for individual developers and small teams, and higher charges for enterprise customers.\n         </p>\n         <figure class=\"jb jc jd je jf do da db paragraph-image\">\n          <div class=\"da db km\">\n           <div class=\"eo r eh ep\">\n            <div class=\"kn r\">\n             <div class=\"ej ek s t u el ai br em en\">\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai er es et\" height=\"104\" role=\"presentation\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/60/0*UkGHmum7F1i_25Mt.?q=20\" width=\"409\"/>\n             </div>\n             <img class=\"ej ek s t u el ai eu\" height=\"104\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"409px\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*UkGHmum7F1i_25Mt. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/818/0*UkGHmum7F1i_25Mt. 409w\" width=\"409\"/>\n             <noscript>\n              <img class=\"s t u el ai\" height=\"104\" role=\"presentation\" sizes=\"409px\" src=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/818/0*UkGHmum7F1i_25Mt.\" srcset=\"https://miro.medium.com/max/552/0*UkGHmum7F1i_25Mt. 276w, https://miro.medium.com/max/818/0*UkGHmum7F1i_25Mt. 409w\" width=\"409\"/>\n             </noscript>\n            </div>\n           </div>\n          </div>\n         </figure>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"7360\">\n          It\u2019s Alive\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"9c45\">\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://itsalive.io/en/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           <strong class=\"hs ja\">\n            It\u2019s Alive\n           </strong>\n          </a>\n          is a free Facebook page chatbot building platform. The core feature of the platform is recipes. This feature enables you to automatically respond when your users write specific keywords or phrases. If your chatbot has missed a keyword, it will be added to new or existing recipes. The platform enables you to send periodic content (RSS) each day, week or month, or to manually send a one-time message to each chatbot subscriber. The team believes in decision trees and buttons that drive users towards the answer they are looking for\n          <a class=\"co hc if ig ih ii\" href=\"https://itsalive.io/en/\" rel=\"noopener\" target=\"_blank\">\n           [23]\n          </a>\n          .\n         </p>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"2f3b\">\n          Conclusion\n         </h1>\n         <p class=\"hq hr ey ar hs b ht iv hv iw hx ix hz iy ib iz id dj\" id=\"6564\">\n          If it is necessary for your business to create a chatbot, hundreds of various chatbot-building platforms are available. There are tools that are centered on a domain-specific topic or universal tools, platforms that allow you to program your chatbot using SDKs, platforms that do not require coding, and environments that support English or your primary language. There are paid and free platforms.\n         </p>\n         <h1 class=\"ij ik ey ar aq il fa im fc in io ip iq ir is it iu\" id=\"ad95\">\n          Sources\n         </h1>\n         <ol class=\"\">\n It is possible to use pre-existing, world-class, pre-built models from Bing and Cortana. Models deployment to an HTTP endpoint is a one-click operation; it returns easy-to-use JavaScript Object Notation (JSON). LUIS offers a set of programmatic REST APIs that can be used by developers to automate the application creation process. is the next generation chatbot engine that has won the Loebner\u2019s 4 times and is the basis for natural language company for a variety of tech startups. ChatScript is a rule-based engine. Rules are created in program scripts through a process called dialog flow scripting. These use a scripting metalanguage (a script) as their source code [16]. ChatScript engine has many features like powerful pattern matching aimed at detecting meaning, simple rule layout combined with C-style general scripting, built-in WordNet dictionary, extensive extensible ontology, local machine control via popen\\u002Ftcpopen\\u002Fjsonopen, structured JSON data reading from websites, and others. ChatScript runs on Windows, Linux, Mac, iOS, or Android. It has integrated tools to support maintaining and testing large systems. UTF8 support allows scripts written in any language.
